sub_title: Long Distance Biker - Storyteller - Sharing Dear Moments and Experiences.
summary:
After almost 40 years Océ/Canon in many different functions in technical, business and people development, I decided to enjoy an early retirement, to be able to bike long distances, learn and share my stories and experiences to anybody with a growth mindset for the benefit of their own personal and wished career development.

Life is like a long distance bike ride. During my rides Transalps, to Santiago de Compostela and to Rome, I've experienced what resilience, perseverance and willpower really mean, and what it takes in practice - lifepower. I came to the understanding that many lessons are directly applicable and useful in our private, professional and business lives. 
Happy to share my stories, experiences and lessons. 

"Whatever you do, get the best out of yourself, involve friends, do good to others."
More than just a phrase - I've been in the arena. 

My passion is to inspire others to get the best out of themselves. 
My ambition is to be a good human. 

Professional experiences: 
People and Leadership Development
International Marketing
Business Development
Logistics and Business Operations
Sales and Sales Management
Corporate Strategy & Product Planning
Engineering, Research & Development

Specialties: 
Long Distance Biking - FLIPFLOP Mindset
Change - Challenges & Opportunities
Leadership - Vulnerability
Grow Performance in Sales
GROW - Coaching for Performance
